The animals wanted to be the only special animal on the field. So, they told the rabbit to go away. But the rabbit didn't want to go. It did some funny tricks and it hopped all around the field.
The animals got so angry and scared, they chased the rabbit away. But then a big surprise arrived. The rabbit opened its mouth and out popped some amazing colour! With its colour it made the open field become beautiful and bright. Everyone was so amazed that they forgot they wanted the rabbit to go away. They welcomed it with open arms.
From that day forward the rabbit lived happily on the open

mom came back and saw the messy room. She was sad and said, "Tim, I told you to clean your room, but you did not listen." Tim felt bad because he made his mom sad. The messy room stayed messy and Tim did not get to play with his microscope that day.

. She said she was proud of him for being kind and generous. She gave him some money and told him to buy some bread and milk for the old man.
Tom ran to the old man and gave him the bread and milk. He said, "Here, sir, this is for you. I hope you like it."
The old man was surprised and grateful. He thanked Tom and said, "You are a very good boy. You have a big heart. God bless you."
Tom felt happy and warm. He learned a lesson that day. He learned that having things is not as important as sharing and caring.

little boy ran to his mother for help, but she was angry. "I told you to only play for a short time," she said sternly. The little boy said sorry and sadly went back outside.
But it was too late. The spooky noises were getting louder and he was so scared he couldn't move. He was so frightened that he just lay there until morning came. Sadly, the little boy never played outside again.

the cat, so he thought of a plan.
Tim told the cat to be kind to others and share with them. The cat listened to Tim and started to be nice. As the cat was being kind, it began to shrink! Soon, the cat was small and not scary anymore. People started to like the cat and Tim.
The moral of the story is that being kind and helpful can make you a hero, even if you are small and look different.
